constraints.name: query_limit
constraints.description: 查询次数限制，最多可以进行 ⌊n/2⌋ 次查询

constraints.name: tree_structure
constraints.description: 输入的图是一个树结构，且根节点是需要找到的目标节点
constraints.formal: G is a tree, and the root r is the target node

constraints.name: lca_query
constraints.description: 每次查询返回两个节点的最近公共祖先
